title: Gifting error with Xayah

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: so i tried to gift my friend xayah cause were gifting each other to get the last part of the duo and its saying that error and its annoying rito pls fix

replies.body: This gifting pool error was happening if you tried to gift a friend who already had the champion unlocked on their own.  The messaging is confusing, but you can confirm with your friend to see if they already got it.  Let me know if this is still an issue!
